</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets foreground color of given control. Color is in format [[Color|Color (RGBA)]]. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> control '''ctrlSetForegroundColor''' color </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control: [[Control]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> color: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <ext><name>pre</name><attr/><inner>_control ctrlSetForegroundColor [1, 0, 0, 1]</inner><close></pre></close></ext> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
